sentences.en: He came into the room so quietly that he took me unawares.
sentences.cn: 他进到房间是那么轻,致使我吃了一惊.

sentences.en: His sudden appearance took Chang Su - su unawares, and she fidgeted uneasily.
sentences.cn: 张素素猛不防是李玉亭,便有几分不自在.

sentences.en: I am myself fallen unawares into the snares of death.
sentences.cn: 我自己不知不觉跌进了死神的陷阱.

sentences.en: I do beg you will not be taken unawares this time.
sentences.cn: 我恳求你,这一次不要被人搞得措手不及.

sentences.en: Investors and currency dealers were caught completely unawares by the Bundesbank's action.
sentences.cn: 投资者和外汇交易商被德意志联邦银行的这一举措打了个措手不及。

sentences.en: Must we simultaneously thrust the Unawares out at the back entrance?
sentences.cn: 难道我们同时非把辨识派赶出后门不可?

sentences.en: Old age creeps upon one unawares.
sentences.cn: 不知不觉老年就来临了.

sentences.en: Quite unawares , he had reached the bridge over the Zhonghai Lake.
sentences.cn: 不知不觉的, 他来到了中海.

sentences.en: Rosamond was not one of those helpless girls who betray themselves unawares.
sentences.cn: 罗莎蒙德不是那种软弱无能的女孩子、会在不知不觉中暴露自己.

sentences.en: Sometimes our expectations sneak up on us unawares.
sentences.cn: 有些时候，我们期待的事情会不期而至。

sentences.en: The camera had caught her unawares .
sentences.cn: 她毫无防备地被拍摄下来。

sentences.en: The enemy came on us unawares.
The hot weather of July had crept upon them unawares.
sentences.cn: 7月的热天气,不知不觉地就蹑迹潜踪,悄然来临.

sentences.en: The suspect was taken unawares, without the chance to dispose of the evidence.
sentences.cn: 嫌疑人被弄了个措手不及，根本来不及销毁证据。

sentences.en: The words slipped out unawares from her mouth after the long constraint.
sentences.cn: 那句话在长期受到禁锢之后下意识地从她嘴里溜了出来.

sentences.en: We had walked unawares over the border.
sentences.cn: 我们无意中越过了边界。

words.tran_cn: 不知不觉地；出其不意地；不料

trans.tran_cn: 出其不意地，意外地，突然地，不知不觉地
